matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.expr: node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="$cluster", exported_instance="$node"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{job="$cluster", exported_instance="$node"} - (node_memory_Cached_bytes{job="$cluster", exported_instance="$node"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{job="$cluster", exported_instance="$node"} + node_memory_SReclaimable_bytes{job="$cluster", exported_instance="$node"})
